titles.title: To provide the legal framework and income tax treatment necessary for the growth of innovative private financing options, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, Education and Labor, Armed Services, and Veterans' Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
